name: Chameo
description:
A 2D metroidvania style game developed for a class project. AI for Game Programming at UCF. 

Adventure through the world of Chameo as a friendly chameleon using your  color changing ability to change how you interact with the world and the enemies and characters within. Explore different areas to unlock new abilities that will help you reach areas that were previously inaccessible.

The Team:

Samuel Beatson

Christopher Frietas

Anthony Jackson

Scott McLeod
